Room.Name: Neilian Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Neilian Drive, north of the Temple of Harmonic Discord.
Room.LongDescription: The Temple of Harmonic Discord is a strange cult of hypocrits who somehow think that if there's a problem, there's a peaceful way around it. This is never true because no one ever wants to give up what they have "for the better good". Nevertheless, they keep trying.
